title: I'm trying to cast my Pixel 4 to my Chromebook. On the same wifi network
content:
I have a Pixel 4 and Chromebook. On the Chromebook under connected devices, it says Google Pixel 4 Enabled. On the Pixel 4 under Connection Preferences, it says the phone is connected to Chromebook. But when I try to cast from my phone to my Chromebook, the screen says "No nearby devices were found."

What gives?
